analysis.description:
Jackpot._checkMinorPrizes (/unique_chucks/8/0xe64d5f33e28387855d33980719f27f0d579392af.sol#945-965) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- user.transfer(etherPayout) (/unique_chucks/8/0xe64d5f33e28387855d33980719f27f0d579392af.sol)
	- user.transfer(etherPayout) (/unique_chucks/8/0xe64d5f33e28387855d33980719f27f0d579392af.sol)
	- user.transfer(etherPayout) (/unique_chucks/8/0xe64d5f33e28387855d33980719f27f0d579392af.sol)

Reentrancy in Jackpot.fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0xe64d5f33e28387855d33980719f27f0d579392af.sol#506-698):
	External calls:
	- croupierPool = token.frozenPool() (/unique_chucks/8/0xe64d5f33e28387855d33980719f27f0d579392af.sol#593-594)
	- jackpotPool = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/8/0xe64d5f33e28387855d33980719f27f0d579392af.sol#594-595)
	External calls sending eth:
	- terminated = checkTermination() (/unique_chucks/8/0xe64d5f33e28387855d33980719f27f0d579392af.sol#566)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBetUser (/unique_chucks/8/0xe64d5f33e28387855d33980719f27f0d579392af.sol#652)
	- pendingEtherForCroupier (/unique_chucks/8/0xe64d5f33e28387855d33980719f27f0d579392af.sol#644-645)
	- terminationTime (/unique_chucks/8/0xe64d5f33e28387855d33980719f27f0d579392af.sol#652-654)

Jackpot.fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0xe64d5f33e28387855d33980719f27f0d579392af.sol#506-698) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- jackpotPool == 0 || tokens <= croupierPool
